com.jasonwjones.pbcs.client

Interface PbcsConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PbcsConnectionImpl

    public interface PbcsConnection
    Basic details for a connection to the PBCS API.
    Author:
    Jason Jones

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getIdentityDomain()
      The identity domain associated with the given user
      String getPassword()
      The password for the user
      String getServer()
      Returns the server name, which does not contain the scheme or anything after the TLD suffix, such as our-company-pbcs-server.pbcs.us2.oraclecloud.com.
      String getUsername()
      The username used to connect to the PBCS instance

    • Method Detail

      • getServer

        String getServer()
        Returns the server name, which does not contain the scheme or anything after the TLD suffix, such as our-company-pbcs-server.pbcs.us2.oraclecloud.com.
        Returns:
        the PBCS server name

      • getIdentityDomain

        String getIdentityDomain()
        The identity domain associated with the given user
        Returns:
        the user's identity domain

      • getUsername

        String getUsername()
        The username used to connect to the PBCS instance
        Returns:
        the PBCS username

      • getPassword

        String getPassword()
        The password for the user
        Returns:
        the password for the user
